column4: 10.10 will be supported for some time, so you'll be able to do updates for a while
one thing though. I set up a LAMP setup, which "survived" into U11. Any way for me to take a backup of key "setup" files, so I can get localhost back up after doing a fresh reinstall of U10?
I'm not familiar with LAMP, so I don't know, really. It'll depend on how/where the settings are stored
yeah. LAMP as in an apache2 server, on localhost :)
